
test=int(raw_input())
for t in range(test):
    
    lenght=int(raw_input())
    l1=map(int,raw_input().split())
    l2=map(int,raw_input().split())
    l=[]
    l1.sort()
    l2.sort()
    ans=0
    i=0
    j=0
    result=[]
    while True:
        
        if i>=lenght or j>=lenght:
            break
        else:
            
            if l1[i]<l2[j]:
                ans +=1
                result.append(ans)
                i +=1
            elif l1[i]>l2[j]:
                ans -=1
                j +=1
            elif l1[i]==l2[j]:
                i+=1
                j+=1

    t=0
    for ans in result:
        if t<ans:
            t=ans
    print t
